    • checkClientHeartbeats

      public void checkClientHeartbeats() throws RemoteException
      Checks, for each RMIClient, how much time has passed since last heartbeat. If more than 3 seconds have passed, shut GameServer and all clients down.
      Throws:
      RemoteException
